speaker: Narration
text: [i]You put on your VR headset and launch the custom loader. A bright loading screen flashes before your eyes as the new server boots up.[/i]

speaker: Narration
text: [i]The server is surprisingly stable. After a few seconds, you find yourself in a strange, misty forest. It's eerily quiet, unlike the official servers that play upbeat music during loading.[/i]

speaker: fujiwara
text: This place looks kinda spooky... in a cool way. I like it already.

speaker: kami
text: Right? I knew you’d both be impressed. And look! We already have starter weapons. That’s not something you get on official servers anymore.

speaker: Narration
text: [i]A floating UI pops up in front of you. It asks you to select a starter weapon: a massive broadsword, twin daggers, or a magic staff.[/i]

speaker: Narration
text: [i]You select the broadsword. It appears in your hands, heavy but powerful.[/i]

speaker: kami
text: Ooo, going for the classic tank build, huh? I dig it.

speaker: Narration
text: [i]You select the twin daggers. They’re lightweight and shimmer faintly with some kind of dark energy.[/i]

speaker: fujiwara
text: Fast and deadly — looks like you're going for the rogue type. Nice pick.

speaker: Narration
text: [i]You choose the magic staff. It hums in your hand as if alive, and your vision briefly flickers with arcane runes.[/i]

speaker: kami
text: Mage protagonist? That’s rare for you. Gonna summon meteors next?

speaker: Narration
text: [i]With weapons in hand, the three of you venture deeper into the misty forest, ready to face whatever this strange server throws your way.[/i]
